rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimalistic contemporary design, featuring a neutral color palette and smooth textures.

Open living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Features comfortable seating arrangements, integrated modern lighting, and a cohesive layout that embraces vastu principles by placing the main entrance on an auspicious direction.
An open-plan area merging kitchen with dining space. Includes contemporary cabinetry and energy-efficient appliances, designed to optimize workflow and maintain balance according to vastu shastra.

A dedicated workout zone equipped with modern gym equipment, ample natural light, ventilation, and soundproofing to enhance privacy. Located strategically following vastu guidelines for optimal energy flow.
A quiet, secluded workspace designed for productivity. Features built-in storage solutions, ergonomic design, and proper lighting to minimize eye strain while ensuring privacy.

openings.description: An expansive door with floor-to-ceiling glass panels complementing the contemporary aesthetic while adhering to vastu principles by orienting towards a favorable direction.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed in strategic locations to maximize natural light and provide scenic views, balancing energy and enhancing spatial ambience.
Provides ventilation and a connection with the exterior for the private gym, following local building norms for adequate air circulation.
